title: Living beyond limits
description: When she was 19, Amy Purdy lost both her legs below the knee. And now ... she's a pro snowboarder (and a killer competitor on "Dancing with the Stars"!). In this powerful talk, she shows us how to draw inspiration from life's obstacles.
author: Amy Purdy
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, entertainment, happiness, illness, personal growth, prosthetics
